mapper.select: select s.`name` as stageName,s.poit,d.`name` as docName,d.is_output as isOutput,d.output from tb_plan_template t left join tb_plan_template_item i on t.pkid = i.temp_id left join twf_stage s on s.pkid= i.stage_id left join twf_stage_doc d on d.pkid = i.stage_doc_id where t.pro_code=#{proCode} and t.type=#{type}
select * from tb_plan_item where plan_id = #{planId} and detail_id = #{detailId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_plan_item (plan_id,detail_id,stage_name,poit,doc_name,`output`,created,operator) values (#{planId},#{detailId},#{stageName},#{poit},#{docName},#{output},now(),#{operator})
